channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Facing wrong direction, 7th December
item.description:
Very hard to see lights because this one is facing wrong direction again (happens often!!)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highbury Corner, Highbury, Greater London

item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Tree vandalism, 7th December
item.description:
I walked past this new tree yesterday evening around 6pm and it was absolutely fine. It has been vandalised. This is a known problem around this area and is a brand new tree :(

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing public bin by Beadon Road bus stop, 7th December
item.description:
Yet again this bin is overflowing with rubbish placed on top and by the side of the bin. Please empty this and increase your routine collections.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cameron Road, Hayes, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People sitting in stairs smoking weed and vaping then leaving thir litter and rubish everywhere, 7th December
item.description:
Group of people in the staircase smoking and eating then leaving rubish in stairs also doing graffiti This is for 14-24 DUNNOCK MEWS
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunnock Mews, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous pavement serious trip hazard for elderly, 7th December
item.description:
Pavement is very damaged and uneven, redident at number 93, aged 88, had a serious fall, severely injured, covered in blood and had to go to hospital due to this issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amberley Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: My silver Peugeot car is blocked off existing by the grey car parked on a double yellow line., 7th December
item.description:
Such problem is always done by this vehicle owner. Who also has no disabled parking ticket in their vehicle. I called the police and I have a reference number. I am scared that this person will attack me physically due to her known crime history and manner

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hackney Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green man never lights up, 7th December
item.description:
When press the wait button, green man never lights up, the lights do not even stop for long enough to let anyone cross. These are the pedestrian lights on the 4 way traffic crossing at Green lane and Parish Lane outside Chris' Central church.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road kill fox, 7th December
item.description:
Fox was hit overnight and dead in the road on the bridge over the railway when I walked past in the morning. I removed it from the road as the bridge is a bottleneck width-wise and before it got mashed any more up by moronic drivers. I placed the body on the grass next to the big tree immediately north of the railway bridge on the same side as the Water Treatment Works
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Station Road, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed humps have no markings, 7th December
item.description:
The speed humps down this road have no arrow markings in white paint which means they are incredibly difficult to see especially at night. You don’t see them until you’re right upon them. They need markings
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arnhem Avenue
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed humps have no markings, 7th December
item.description:
The speed bumps in this road and others adjoining have no markings at all! This is extremely dangerous when at night as you cannot see them until you’re right on them! Please repaint the arrow markings on them in here and Arnhem Avenue before someone sues TBC for damage to their car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hall Avenue
Report on FixMyStreet
